original: Knutson, Karl Knut Arthur, komminister, Gistad, f. 28/1/05 i Hogstad, ö’Stergötl. 1., av Johan Knut Gustavsson o. Anna Maria Runn. G. 39 m. skolkökslär. Ruth Astrid Hilma Maria Bergh. Barn: Christer f. 40, Thomas 45. — Stud:ex. i Lund 24, fil. kand. i Gbg 27, teol. kand. i Upps. 33, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Linköp. stift 34. Tjg. som v. kommin. i Norrköp., past:adj. i Kristdala, V. Harg, Skeppsås o. Linderås, v. pastor i Vinnerstad, kommin. i Gistad sed. 39. Ordf. i skolråd, kyrkostämma, komm: stämma o. kyrkokör, ordf. o. ka:s’SÖr i fam :bidr :nd, ordf. i Gistads kyrkobrödrakår, sekr. i Linköp. stiftskrets av SYPF.
translated:
Knutson, Karl Knut Arthur, vicar, Gistad, born on January 28, 1905 in Hogstad, Östergötland. Son of Johan Knut Gustavsson and Anna Maria Runn. Married in 1939 to the school kitchen teacher Ruth Astrid Hilma Maria Bergh. Children: Christer, born in 1940, Thomas, born in 1945. 

Education: Graduated from Lund University in 1924, received a Bachelor of Arts degree from Gothenburg in 1927, received a Bachelor of Theology degree from Uppsala in 1933. Practical theological examination and ordained as a priest in the Linköping diocese in 1934. 

Worked as an assistant vicar in Norrköping, assistant pastor in Kristdala, V. Harg, Skeppsås, and Linderås, temporary pastor in Vinnerstad, and vicar in Gistad since 1939. Served as chairman of the school council, church assembly, municipality assembly, and church choir. Also served as chairman and committee member in various family support organizations. Chairman of Gistad's church brotherhood, secretary of the Linköping district of the Swedish Young People's Christian Association (SYPF).
